front.title: IEEE Guide for the Design, Construction, and Operation of Safe and Reliable Substations for Environmental Acceptance
front.abstract: More and more substations are becoming necessary, due to the ever increasing load growth being evidenced by most electric utility companies and the requirement to keep pace with the demands for additional distribution facilities. This guide documents significant environmental items to be considered during the design phase, the construction period, and the operation of safe and reliable substations for community acceptance.<>
